Instance.description: Represents a persistable state on an object.

TunableVariant.name: _display_data
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify display data for this instance.

TunableVariant.name: instance_display_description
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify a display description for this instance.

TunableVariant.name: instance_display_icon
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify a display icon for this instance.

TunableVariant.name: instance_display_name
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify a display name for this instance.

TunableVariant.name: failed_to_load_state_value
TunableVariant.description: When loading states, if there is a load error of a state value not found, by default it will always reset to the default state value. But if this is enabled, it will be set to a custom state.

Tunable.name: set_state
Tunable.description: A state value to be set on state load failure.

Tunable.name: persists_across_gallery
Tunable.description: Check only if this state should be persisted when the object is downloaded from the gallery. If its unchecked and the object comes from the gallery it will go to its default state. Additionally any state with a linked stat needs to have that linked stat also marked as gallery persisted. i.e. Most states like dirty and broken are not meant to be saved on the gallery, only states like crafted_quality or ingredient quality should be saved. Switching on this bit has performance implications when downloading a lot from the gallery. Please discuss with a GPE when setting this tunable.

TunableEnum.description: If any tags are tuned, this state's value will be synchronized between all objects placed in the zone with at least one of the tuned tags.
